section.name: Summary
section.p: dishevelled.org layout provides layout manager(s) for lightweight JFC/Swing components. The only layout manager included to date is LabelFieldLayout.

section.name: LabelFieldLayout
section.p: LabelFieldLayout is a wrapper around GridBagLayout that simplifies things for the common case of two columns, one of labels and one of fields.

The final component in a LabelFieldLayout stretches vertically to cover space left at the bottom of its container. It can be either an empty component, such as Box.createGlue(), a wide label, or a wide field, such as a JList in a JScrollPane, as this image demonstrates:
